short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark mode for Crunchyroll among others

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this, you can:
1) Turn on a dark mode
2) Hide video thumbnails
3) Enable a focus mode

Why?
1) Less bright = happier eyes
2) Avoid spoilers ðŸ˜¡
3) Get rid of distractions

Also hides most ads/banners on the page by default
